name: Flightradar24 Major Update!  Full Review
description:
Flight tracking website FlightRadar24 has had a massive update, here's a full review of all the new features!

They've introduced some great new features, including a fantastic new 3D view, the ability to playback historic flights for up to a year, and some great new benefits to FR24 feeders.  They also introduced a new range of membership plans with some great benefits to each one.

Check out my full review to see the new FlightRadar24 up close.

Websites mentioned:

Flightradar24:  www.flightradar24.com
FR24KML: www.marshgiddings.com/fr24kml
ADSBExchange: www.adsbexchange.com/
